UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: First-in-Class Cyclic Temporin L Analogue: Design, Synthesis, and Antimicrobial Assessment.

Literature.Title: Antifungal and Antibiofilm Activity of Cyclic Temporin L Peptide Analogues against Albicans and Non-Albicans Candida Species.
Literature.Author: Bellavita R, Maione A, Merlino F, Siciliano A, Dardano P, De Stefano L, Galdiero S, Galdiero E, Grieco P, Falanga A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>100µM),Bacillus megaterium Bm11(MIC=12.5µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>100µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>100µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>50µM),Candida parapsilosis DSM 5784(MIC=>50µM)
